attributes.action: Award the special badge of recognition for the Womens Timber Corps and Womens Land Army to be extended to the women who are deceased!.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All the members of The Womens Timber Corps WTC and Womens Land Army WLA should be awarded this badge of recognition for their contribution during War time. Their families are so very proud of their mothers/sisters/aunts/grandmothers.... and I know that my mother campaigned to be recognised for all the work she did. I don't understand that because my mother has died that she shouldn't have recognition... and this medal will proudly sit along with her Womens Timber Corps badge in my memorabilia.
